metadata.synopsis: This dialog replaces EA version in Gustav mod!After the goblin hunt celebration party, this companion has made arrangements to get intimate with the player at night. Note: this can only happen if player already knows about Mizora
metadata.how_to_trigger: Ctrl-7 for companiondebug book and choose Romance nights, night 1.

40.speaker: Wyll
40.text: Have a laugh, make some noise. I'll be my charming self before you know it.
40.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player approaches Wyll, who is lost in thought. He is visibly startled to see you appear.

52.speaker: Wyll
52.text: Agh, Hells! I was hoping you wouldn't notice I was gone.
52.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player approaches Wyll, who is lost in thought. He is visibly startled to see you appear.

112.speaker: Wyll
112.text: Oh, I'm deeply proud of you. A touch less so of myself.

108.speaker: Player
108.text: Of course I noticed. It was no party without you.

124.speaker: Player
124.text: What exactly do you think you're doing sulking out here? Get your arse back to the party!

176.speaker: Wyll
176.text: Ha! Oh, the Blade doesn't sulk. I was just reflecting on what has happened, and not wanting to be Mister Serious at a celebration.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Sounds like some pretty words for sulking to me!

120.speaker: Wyll
120.text: I can say it even more nicely.

148.speaker: Wyll
148.text: I'm, ahem, soberly pondering my state of affairs, and not wishing to drag a single happy soul into a state of melancholy.
148.context: NodeContext: Making fun of his own sulking

130.speaker: Player
130.text: Oh shush. Let yourself have fun.

21.speaker: Wyll
21.text: I know how to have fun! I have lots of fun every day!

19.speaker: Wyll
19.text: Saving the people of the grove was all the satisfaction I could ask.

38.speaker: Wyll
38.text: I don't need a party on top of that!

69.speaker: Wyll
69.text: In truth, I don't feel in a festive mood, and didn't want to cast a grey cloud over the night.

62.speaker: Wyll
62.text: I'm a devil. I love the people from the grove, but I unsettle them deep down.
62.context: NodeContext: Wyll seems truly mournful, just for one moment.

77.speaker: Wyll
77.text: As I seem to unsettle everyone nowadays.
77.context: NodeContext: Wyll seems truly mournful, just for one moment.

98.speaker: Wyll
98.text: You don't want a devil at your party.
98.context: NodeContext: Very jovially, trying to make light of the situation

162.speaker: Wyll
162.text: Horns this sharp will pop the balloons, you see. And the guests won't take kindly to scars quite so monstrous.
162.context: NodeContext: Very jovially, trying to make light of the situation

83.speaker: Player
83.text: To our kind, those features just make you more attractive.

154.speaker: Wyll
154.text: You pull them off far more finely than I do.

23.speaker: Player
23.text: You don't unsettle me, you know that.

160.speaker: Wyll
160.text: If only half the world had half the heart you do.

121.speaker: Player
121.text: You just have some fetching horns! I'm envious.

67.speaker: Wyll
67.text: Ouch! You don't need to mock me when I'm feeling low.

147.speaker: Player
147.text: Come on, you're exaggerating. Not that much has changed.

26.speaker: Wyll
26.text: I feel spikes beginning to sprout in places they really shouldn't.

93.speaker: Wyll
93.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll realises he may have been better off not revealing that.NodeContext: Embarrassed

46.speaker: Player
46.text: Sorry it has you feeling rough tonight.

133.speaker: Wyll
133.text: Ah, I'll be fine. Seeing you has cheered me more than you can know.

164.speaker: Wyll
164.text: We've saved the grove, and everyone hails us as heroes.
164.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll looks you up and down.

60.speaker: Wyll
60.text: For you, it's as clear as cool water you have that heroism within you.
60.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll looks you up and down.

167.speaker: Wyll
167.text: But Karlach is dead, and Gods know how many other of my victims were people like her.
167.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll looks you up and down.

125.speaker: Wyll
125.text: I shouldn't be celebrated tonight. That's why I left.
125.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll looks you up and down.

105.speaker: Player
105.text: Don't beat yourself up. We are doing the best we can, together.
105.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll looks you up and down.

72.speaker: Wyll
72.text: But off with you. This is your day! Have a dance. Enjoy the music.
72.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll looks you up and down.

178.speaker: Player
178.text: I want to dance with you.
178.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll looks you up and down.

51.speaker: Wyll
51.text: Ha! In truth, I always enjoyed a bit of pomp.
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll looks you up and down.

45.speaker: Wyll
45.text: I once beat the Baldurian record for the most sarabandes danced in a single evening.
45.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll looks you up and down.

156.speaker: Wyll
156.text: Much to the exhaustion of the good ladies and gentlemen of the Gate.
156.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll looks you up and down.

99.speaker: Wyll
99.text: I imagine you're fairly skilled with your form, too. That would be a sight to behold.
99.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll looks you up and down.

58.speaker: Wyll
58.text: I had years of lessons but in truth, it's all about your partner.
58.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll eyes you up and down.

70.speaker: Wyll
70.text: You cut quite a fine figure. I can just imagine leading you with an entire ballroom watching.

8.speaker: Wyll
8.text: But who am I fooling? I can't go back to that life.

158.speaker: Player
158.text: If not a dance, then maybe a kiss.

59.speaker: Player
59.text: If not a dance, then maybe a kiss.

123.speaker: Wyll
123.text: Maybe another time. Now, you've got a party to get back to. Don't forget, tonight is about you.

166.text: Maybe another time. Now, you've got a party to get back to. Don't forget, tonight is about you.

17.speaker: Wyll
17.text: Maybe another time. Now, you've got a party to get back to. Don't forget, tonight is about you.

144.speaker: Player
144.text: Why not? You never know what the future holds.

81.speaker: Wyll
81.text: Too many reasons to count. I might share them someday.

175.speaker: Player
175.text: Maybe we could pretend. Just for one night.

63.speaker: Wyll
63.text: But not tonight. Tonight is about you.

95.speaker: Player
95.text: I would give anything to have seen it.
95.context: CinematicNodeContext: A moment of quiet passes between Wyll and Tav. Tav looks expectantly towards Wyll.

82.speaker: Wyll
82.text: Aw, by Balduran's elbow, I can't stay feeling gloomy with you looking at me like that.
82.context: CinematicNodeContext: A moment of quiet passes between Wyll and Tav. Tav looks expectantly towards Wyll.

138.speaker: Wyll
138.text: You have a vow from the Blade. He will show you a wonderful time, another night.

36.speaker: Wyll
36.text: I'm afraid my feet are firmly planted to the ground this evening.

117.speaker: Player
117.text: Can't you tell why I really followed you out here?
117.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll plays dumb in a little game with the player for this sectionNodeContext: Jokingly, and trying to avoid talking about what he knows is obvious

143.speaker: Wyll
143.text: Clearly to practice your forest tracking.
143.context: CinematicNodeContext: Wyll plays dumb in a little game with the player for this sectionNodeContext: Jokingly, and trying to avoid talking about what he knows is obvious

12.speaker: Wyll
12.text: I love the way your nose wrinkles up when you get the scent of a lead for the first time.

31.speaker: Wyll
31.text: Clearly Mol has put you up to stealing my britches so you can turn them into a flag for her gang.
31.context: NodeContext: Very clearly teasing you flirtily

161.speaker: Wyll
161.text: You must have stumbled out here by complete accident.
161.context: NodeContext: Very clearly teasing you flirtily

132.speaker: Wyll
132.text: Too much honey-wine can do that. You should watch yourself.
132.context: NodeContext: Very clearly teasing you flirtily

172.speaker: Player
172.text: Actually, I thought I might steal a kiss.
172.context: NodeContext: Very clearly teasing you flirtily

180.speaker: Player
180.text: Actually, I thought I might steal a kiss.
180.context: NodeContext: Very clearly teasing you flirtily

151.speaker: Player
151.context: NodeContext: Very clearly teasing you flirtily

50.speaker: Player
50.context: NodeContext: Very clearly teasing you flirtily

135.speaker: Wyll
135.text: Oh! I will safeguard my undergarments with care.
135.context: NodeContext: Very clearly teasing you flirtily

89.speaker: Wyll
89.text: Let me think... Why are you really here?
89.context: NodeContext: Very clearly teasing you flirtily

13.speaker: Wyll
13.text: You must be Volo in disguise, out here to harangue me for some tales of the Frontiers.
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

152.speaker: Wyll
152.text: What a cruel disguise! My nerves started hammering the second I thought they were the one looking for me.

97.speaker: Wyll
97.text: Karlach got lusty at the party, didn't she?
97.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

137.speaker: Wyll
137.text: She's started a huge fire, and you're trying to save my life.

111.speaker: Wyll
111.text: You're running away from Gale's cooking.
111.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

118.speaker: Wyll
118.text: It's delicious, don't get me wrong, but that man wouldn't eat a vegetable unless Mystra herself commanded it.

37.speaker: Wyll
37.text: You were hoping for some peace and quiet out in the forest, and I have ruined your night entirely.
37.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

57.speaker: Wyll
57.text: Why else? There couldn't be another reason.
57.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

55.speaker: Player
55.text: I better come clean - I wanted a kiss.
55.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

179.speaker: Player
179.text: I better come clean - I wanted a kiss.
179.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

49.speaker: Player
49.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

74.speaker: Wyll
74.text: It's a long shot, but - maybe you've grown fond of me. Gods know I've grown fond of you.
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

48.speaker: Player
48.text: Damn right I'm fond of you.
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

53.speaker: Wyll
53.text: Gods know why. You'd be well within your rights to burn me alive.

169.speaker: Wyll
169.text: Well, it just so happens I'm fond of you too.

32.speaker: Player
32.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

134.speaker: Wyll
134.text: Then we share a similar affliction. For I've grown fond of you too.
134.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

14.speaker: Wyll
14.text: Though I can't say I've earned the honour.
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

165.speaker: Wyll
165.text: I haven't even managed to kill one measly devil. I'm hardly a prime catch.
165.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

88.speaker: Wyll
88.text: The world spits on those partial to devils. I'm hardly a prime catch.
88.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

140.speaker: Player
140.text: Maybe a kiss would prove my affections.
140.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

18.speaker: Wyll
18.text: *Sigh.* You drive a hard bargain. But just the one.
18.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

96.speaker: Wyll
96.text: *Sigh.* You drive a hard bargain. But just the one.
96.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

87.speaker: Wyll
87.text: I - well, then. Erm, you've got a party to get back to. After all, tonight is about you.
87.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll share a quick kiss.

126.speaker: Wyll
126.text: I - well, then. Erm, you've got a party to get back to. After all, tonight is about you.
126.context: CinematicNodeContext: Smiling and slightly embarrassed. Tall player version.

145.speaker: Wyll
145.text: There will be another time for us.
145.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll places his hand on Tav's shoulder. Tall playert player

47.text: I - well, then. Erm, you've got a party to get back to. After all, tonight is about you.
47.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and Wyll stoops to share a quick kiss.

86.speaker: Wyll
86.text: I - well, then. Erm, you've got a party to get back to. After all, tonight is about you.
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: Smiling and slightly embarrassed. Short player version.

33.speaker: Wyll
33.text: There will be another time for us.
33.context: CinematicNodeContext: (SCENE) Wyll places his hand on Tav's shoulder. Short player

116.text: A kiss? Well - I can't say I'm not tempted. But not here, not now.

43.speaker: Wyll
43.text: A kiss? Well - I can't say I'm not tempted. But not here, not now.

177.speaker: Player
177.text: Maybe a kiss would prove my affections.

94.speaker: Player
94.text: That's not true. You're an incredible person, Wyll.

7.speaker: Wyll
7.text: I'm not sure that I am. But it means something that you think so.

155.speaker: Wyll
155.text: Now, you've got a party to get back to. Don't forget, tonight is about you.

171.speaker: Player
171.text: You don't need to be the Blade of Frontiers for me, just be yourself.

122.speaker: Wyll
122.text: The Blade is my best self. On my best days, I've even lived up to the name.

28.speaker: Wyll
28.text: Oh! Seems I stumbled ahead of myself. Wouldn't be the first time.

153.speaker: Wyll
153.text: Some time alone beneath the stars, and I'll be back to my old self. Promise.

76.speaker: Wyll
76.text: Still - it's a night to remember. You've made sure of that.

131.speaker: Wyll
131.text: I mean - the Blade hasn't exactly lived up to his own reputation.

56.speaker: Wyll
56.text: You have many talents, but subtlety isn't one of them.

110.speaker: Player
110.text: I just wanted to see if my friend was all right, nothing more.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: Because I like you. And I want to know you better.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: I just wanted a quick chat. I'll leave you to it.

68.speaker: Wyll
68.text: Thanks. It's good to know someone's looking out.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: I like you, Wyll. And I want to know you better.

6.speaker: Player
6.text: I just wanted to check up on you, that's all.

80.speaker: Wyll
80.text: If so, I'm afraid I must remain a passing fancy. If not, well, it wouldn't be my first misjudgement.

64.speaker: Wyll
64.text: It's a long shot, but - maybe you've grown fond of me.

9.speaker: Player
9.text: I wish you were there, but I'll respect your need for peace.

102.speaker: Wyll
102.text: Twelve impossible deeds every day before the sun reaches its apex.

170.speaker: Wyll
170.text: That's the way of the Blade.

174.speaker: Player
174.text: What can I do to cheer you up?

90.speaker: Player
90.text: Don't complain. We're all still alive, aren't we?

136.speaker: Wyll
136.text: You're safe another day. Really, that should be enough.

2.speaker: Wyll
2.text: These people are still in danger.

141.speaker: Wyll
141.text: Karlach, the creature from Hell, will still threaten them. As will a thousand other perils.

109.speaker: Wyll
109.text: These people are still in danger. A thousand perils still threaten them.

35.speaker: Wyll
35.text: They aren't ready to get on the road on their own.

29.speaker: Player
29.text: We have won this day! Danger is for tomorrow.

54.speaker: Wyll
54.text: Your words cheer me more than any party could.

44.speaker: Player
44.text: You're right, but we need to give them hope.

34.speaker: Wyll
34.text: You're good at it. You've given me some just by being here.

85.speaker: Player
85.text: Have some faith. Whatever happens, they'll survive it.

5.speaker: Wyll
5.text: If only faith was enough to ward off every bully of the wilds.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: So? If they die, they die. That's life for you.

25.speaker: Wyll
25.text: We all die. But life's still worth the living. Otherwise, what's the point of it?
